title: Remembering User Account  -  a) Question for Riot Support
body:
Hey Riot Supp,

I have an account linked to an older email. I can still use this old email, but i forget the summoner user name/login attached to that particular email.  i.e.) legalviirus

Is there a way to look up the user names associated with a specific user's email?

Thanks,
{{champion:432}} {{item:3116}} {{item:2301}}

replies.body: No worries! You can still get things figured out by [**recovering your username**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751724-Recovering-Your-Username). Since you mentioned you still had access to that signup email, put that in the username recovery and then check your email. If you run into any issues with that, feel free to hit us up through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).
